title: Computer-Based Learning Design for Brain Surface Anatomy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of anatomical terminology and human body structures
context.additional_context: Requires personalized feedback tailored to learners' varying spatial perception abilities.

learning_goals: Identify 15 key landmarks of the cerebral surface structure with 80% accuracy
Explain the boundaries of the frontal-parietal-temporal-occipital lobes from three angles in a 3D brain model
Create a brain region mapping report using real clinical cases through project-based assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
